namespace NServiceBus

    public static partial class BasicSagasHandlerRegistryExtensions
    {
        public sealed partial class BasicSagasRootRegistry
        {
            public sealed partial class OrdersRegistry
            {
                public sealed partial class BillingRegistry
                {
                    partial void AddAllSagasCore()
                    {
                        AddOrderBillingPolicy();
                    }

                    /// <summary>
                    /// Registers the <see cref="global::Orders.Billing.OrderBillingPolicy"/> saga with the endpoint configuration.
                    /// </summary>
                    public void AddOrderBillingPolicy()
                    {
                        var sagaMetadataCollection = NServiceBus.Configuration.AdvancedExtensibility.AdvancedExtensibilityExtensions.GetSettings(_configuration)
                           .GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMetadataCollection>();
                        var associatedMessages = new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage[]
                        {
                            new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage(typeof(global::Orders.Billing.OrderBilled), true, false),
                            new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage(typeof(global::Orders.Billing.OrderPlaced), true, false),
                            new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage(typeof(global::Orders.Billing.OrderPlaced), false, true),
                        };
                        NServiceBus.Sagas.MessagePropertyAccessor[] propertyAccessors = [
                            OrderBilledOrderIdAccessor_f7dc3394c771851e.Instance,
                            OrderPlacedOrderIdAccessor_ae6ad694572b9fcb.Instance,
                        ];
                        var metadata = NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMetadata.Create<global::Orders.Billing.OrderBillingPolicy, global::Orders.Billing.OrderBillingPolicyData>(associatedMessages, null, propertyAccessors);
                        sagaMetadataCollection.Add(metadata);

                        var settings = NServiceBus.Configuration.AdvancedExtensibility.AdvancedExtensibilityExtensions.GetSettings(_configuration);
                        var messageHandlerRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.MessageHandlerRegistry>();
                        var messageMetadataRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.Messages.MessageMetadataRegistry>();
                        messageHandlerRegistry.AddMessageHandlerForMessage<global::Orders.Billing.OrderBillingPolicy, global::Orders.Billing.OrderBilled>();
                        messageMetadataRegistry.RegisterMessageTypeWithHierarchy(typeof(global::Orders.Billing.OrderBilled), []);
                        messageHandlerRegistry.AddMessageHandlerForMessage<global::Orders.Billing.OrderBillingPolicy, global::Orders.Billing.OrderPlaced>();
                        messageMetadataRegistry.RegisterMessageTypeWithHierarchy(typeof(global::Orders.Billing.OrderPlaced), []);
                        messageHandlerRegistry.AddTimeoutHandlerForMessage<global::Orders.Billing.OrderBillingPolicy, global::Orders.Billing.OrderPlaced>();
                        messageMetadataRegistry.RegisterMessageTypeWithHierarchy(typeof(global::Orders.Billing.OrderPlaced), []);
                    }
                }
                public sealed partial class ShippingRegistry
                {
                    partial void AddAllSagasCore()
                    {
                        AddOrderShippingPolicy();
                    }

                    /// <summary>
                    /// Registers the <see cref="global::Orders.Shipping.OrderShippingPolicy"/> saga with the endpoint configuration.
                    /// </summary>
                    public void AddOrderShippingPolicy()
                    {
                        var sagaMetadataCollection = NServiceBus.Configuration.AdvancedExtensibility.AdvancedExtensibilityExtensions.GetSettings(_configuration)
                           .GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMetadataCollection>();
                        var associatedMessages = new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage[]
                        {
                            new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage(typeof(global::Orders.Shipping.OrderBilled), false, false),
                            new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage(typeof(global::Orders.Shipping.OrderPlaced), true, false),
                            new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage(typeof(global::Orders.Shipping.OrderPlaced), false, true),
                        };
                        NServiceBus.Sagas.MessagePropertyAccessor[] propertyAccessors = [
                            OrderBilledOrderIdAccessor_08b7b00354e1d041.Instance,
                            OrderPlacedOrderIdAccessor_13dea9c2dc628538.Instance,
                        ];
                        var metadata = NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMetadata.Create<global::Orders.Shipping.OrderShippingPolicy, global::Orders.Shipping.OrderShippingPolicyData>(associatedMessages, null, propertyAccessors);
                        sagaMetadataCollection.Add(metadata);

                        var settings = NServiceBus.Configuration.AdvancedExtensibility.AdvancedExtensibilityExtensions.GetSettings(_configuration);
                        var messageHandlerRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.MessageHandlerRegistry>();
                        var messageMetadataRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.Messages.MessageMetadataRegistry>();
                        messageHandlerRegistry.AddMessageHandlerForMessage<global::Orders.Shipping.OrderShippingPolicy, global::Orders.Shipping.OrderBilled>();
                        messageMetadataRegistry.RegisterMessageTypeWithHierarchy(typeof(global::Orders.Shipping.OrderBilled), []);
                        messageHandlerRegistry.AddMessageHandlerForMessage<global::Orders.Shipping.OrderShippingPolicy, global::Orders.Shipping.OrderPlaced>();
                        messageMetadataRegistry.RegisterMessageTypeWithHierarchy(typeof(global::Orders.Shipping.OrderPlaced), []);
                        messageHandlerRegistry.AddTimeoutHandlerForMessage<global::Orders.Shipping.OrderShippingPolicy, global::Orders.Shipping.OrderPlaced>();
                        messageMetadataRegistry.RegisterMessageTypeWithHierarchy(typeof(global::Orders.Shipping.OrderPlaced), []);
                    }
                }
            }
            public sealed partial class PaymentsRegistry
            {
                partial void AddAllSagasCore()
                {
                    AddPaymentsPolicy();
                }

                /// <summary>
                /// Registers the <see cref="global::Payments.PaymentsPolicy"/> saga with the endpoint configuration.
                /// </summary>
                public void AddPaymentsPolicy()
                {
                    var sagaMetadataCollection = NServiceBus.Configuration.AdvancedExtensibility.AdvancedExtensibilityExtensions.GetSettings(_configuration)
                       .GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMetadataCollection>();
                    var associatedMessages = new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage[]
                    {
                        new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage(typeof(global::Payments.OrderBilled), false, false),
                        new NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMessage(typeof(global::Payments.OrderPlaced), true, false),
                    };
                    NServiceBus.Sagas.MessagePropertyAccessor[] propertyAccessors = [
                        OrderBilledOrderIdAccessor_2fd27f5436ef20b9.Instance,
                        OrderPlacedOrderIdAccessor_c561311f0fcc5cf0.Instance,
                    ];
                    var metadata = NServiceBus.Sagas.SagaMetadata.Create<global::Payments.PaymentsPolicy, global::Payments.PaymentsPolicyData>(associatedMessages, null, propertyAccessors);
                    sagaMetadataCollection.Add(metadata);

                    var settings = NServiceBus.Configuration.AdvancedExtensibility.AdvancedExtensibilityExtensions.GetSettings(_configuration);
                    var messageHandlerRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.MessageHandlerRegistry>();
                    var messageMetadataRegistry = settings.GetOrCreate<NServiceBus.Unicast.Messages.MessageMetadataRegistry>();
                    messageHandlerRegistry.AddMessageHandlerForMessage<global::Payments.PaymentsPolicy, global::Payments.OrderBilled>();
                    messageMetadataRegistry.RegisterMessageTypeWithHierarchy(typeof(global::Payments.OrderBilled), []);
                    messageHandlerRegistry.AddMessageHandlerForMessage<global::Payments.PaymentsPolicy, global::Payments.OrderPlaced>();
                    messageMetadataRegistry.RegisterMessageTypeWithHierarchy(typeof(global::Payments.OrderPlaced), []);
                }
            }
        }
    }

// == NServiceBus.Core.Analyzer/NServiceBus.Core.Analyzer.AddHandlerAndSagasRegistrationGenerator/HandlerRegistrations.g.cs ==
// <auto-generated/>

#nullable enable annotations
#nullable disable warnings

// Suppress warnings about [Obsolete] member usage in generated code.
#pragma warning disable CS0612, CS0618

namespace NServiceBus
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Provides access to handler and saga registries discovered in the <i>BasicSagas</i> assembly.
    /// </summary>
    [global::System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratedCodeAttribute("NService.Core.Analyzer.Tests", "1.0.0")]
    public static partial class BasicSagasHandlerRegistryExtensions
    {
        extension (global::NServiceBus.HandlerRegistry registry)
        {
            /// <summary>
            /// Gets the root registry for handler and saga types in the <i>BasicSagas</i> assembly.
            /// </summary>
            /// <remarks>
            /// Use the returned registry to access namespace-specific registries and add-all methods for this assembly.
            /// </remarks>
            public BasicSagasRootRegistry BasicSagasAssembly => new(registry.Configuration);
        }

        /// <summary>
        /// Root registry to add handlers and sagas for the entire assembly.
        /// </summary>
        public sealed partial class BasicSagasRootRegistry(global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration configuration)
        {
            readonly global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration _configuration = configuration ?? throw new System.ArgumentNullException(nameof(configuration));

            /// <summary>
            /// Gets the registry for the <i>Orders</i> namespace segment under this branch.
            /// </summary>
            public OrdersRegistry Orders => new(_configuration);

            /// <summary>
            /// Gets the registry for the <i>Payments</i> namespace segment under this branch.
            /// </summary>
            public PaymentsRegistry Payments => new(_configuration);

            /// <summary>
            /// Registers all handlers and sagas for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
            /// </summary>
            /// <remarks>
            /// Includes child registries: <see cref="Orders"/>, <see cref="Payments"/>.
            /// </remarks>
            public void AddAll()
            {
                AddAllHandlers();
                AddAllSagas();
            }

            /// <summary>
            /// Registers all handlers for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
            /// </summary>
            /// <remarks>
            /// Includes child registries: <see cref="Orders"/>, <see cref="Payments"/>.
            /// </remarks>
            public void AddAllHandlers()
            {
                AddAllHandlersCore();
                Orders.AddAllHandlers();
                Payments.AddAllHandlers();
            }

            /// <summary>
            /// Registers all sagas for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
            /// </summary>
            /// <remarks>
            /// Includes child registries: <see cref="Orders"/>, <see cref="Payments"/>.
            /// </remarks>
            public void AddAllSagas()
            {
                AddAllSagasCore();
                Orders.AddAllSagas();
                Payments.AddAllSagas();
            }

            partial void AddAllHandlersCore();
            partial void AddAllSagasCore();

            /// <summary>
            /// Registry for the <i>Orders</i> namespace segment. Use this registry to add handlers and sagas for this branch.
            /// </summary>
            public sealed partial class OrdersRegistry(global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration configuration)
            {
                readonly global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration _configuration = configuration ?? throw new System.ArgumentNullException(nameof(configuration));

                /// <summary>
                /// Gets the registry for the <i>Billing</i> namespace segment under this branch.
                /// </summary>
                public BillingRegistry Billing => new(_configuration);

                /// <summary>
                /// Gets the registry for the <i>Shipping</i> namespace segment under this branch.
                /// </summary>
                public ShippingRegistry Shipping => new(_configuration);

                /// <summary>
                /// Registers all handlers and sagas for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
                /// </summary>
                /// <remarks>
                /// Includes child registries: <see cref="Billing"/>, <see cref="Shipping"/>.
                /// </remarks>
                public void AddAll()
                {
                    AddAllHandlers();
                    AddAllSagas();
                }

                /// <summary>
                /// Registers all handlers for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
                /// </summary>
                /// <remarks>
                /// Includes child registries: <see cref="Billing"/>, <see cref="Shipping"/>.
                /// </remarks>
                public void AddAllHandlers()
                {
                    AddAllHandlersCore();
                    Billing.AddAllHandlers();
                    Shipping.AddAllHandlers();
                }

                /// <summary>
                /// Registers all sagas for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
                /// </summary>
                /// <remarks>
                /// Includes child registries: <see cref="Billing"/>, <see cref="Shipping"/>.
                /// </remarks>
                public void AddAllSagas()
                {
                    AddAllSagasCore();
                    Billing.AddAllSagas();
                    Shipping.AddAllSagas();
                }

                partial void AddAllHandlersCore();
                partial void AddAllSagasCore();

                /// <summary>
                /// Registry for the <i>Billing</i> namespace segment. Use this registry to add handlers and sagas for this branch.
                /// </summary>
                public sealed partial class BillingRegistry(global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration configuration)
                {
                    readonly global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration _configuration = configuration ?? throw new System.ArgumentNullException(nameof(configuration));

                    /// <summary>
                    /// Registers all handlers and sagas for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
                    /// </summary>
                    /// <remarks>
                    /// Includes sagas in this namespace: <see cref="AddOrderBillingPolicy"/>.
                    /// </remarks>
                    public void AddAll()
                    {
                        AddAllHandlers();
                        AddAllSagas();
                    }

                    /// <summary>
                    /// Registers all handlers for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
                    /// </summary>
                    public void AddAllHandlers()
                    {
                        AddAllHandlersCore();
                    }

                    /// <summary>
                    /// Registers all sagas for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
                    /// </summary>
                    /// <remarks>
                    /// Includes sagas in this namespace: <see cref="AddOrderBillingPolicy"/>.
                    /// </remarks>
                    public void AddAllSagas()
                    {
                        AddAllSagasCore();
                    }

                    partial void AddAllHandlersCore();
                    partial void AddAllSagasCore();
                }

                /// <summary>
                /// Registry for the <i>Shipping</i> namespace segment. Use this registry to add handlers and sagas for this branch.
                /// </summary>
                public sealed partial class ShippingRegistry(global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration configuration)
                {
                    readonly global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration _configuration = configuration ?? throw new System.ArgumentNullException(nameof(configuration));

                    /// <summary>
                    /// Registers all handlers and sagas for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
                    /// </summary>

                    /// Includes sagas in this namespace: <see cref="AddOrderShippingPolicy"/>.
                    /// </remarks>
                    public void AddAll()

                        AddAllSagas();
                    }

                    /// <summary>

                    /// </summary>

                    }

                    /// <summary>

                    /// </summary>
                    /// <remarks>

                    /// </remarks>
                    public void AddAllSagas()
                    {
                        AddAllSagasCore();
                    }

                    partial void AddAllHandlersCore();
                    partial void AddAllSagasCore();
                }
            }

            /// <summary>
            /// Registry for the <i>Payments</i> namespace segment. Use this registry to add handlers and sagas for this branch.
            /// </summary>
            public sealed partial class PaymentsRegistry(global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration configuration)
            {
                readonly global::NServiceBus.EndpointConfiguration _configuration = configuration ?? throw new System.ArgumentNullException(nameof(configuration));

                /// <summary>
                /// Registers all handlers and sagas for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
                /// </summary>
                /// <remarks>
                /// Includes sagas in this namespace: <see cref="AddPaymentsPolicy"/>.
                /// </remarks>
                public void AddAll()
                {
                    AddAllHandlers();
                    AddAllSagas();
                }

                /// <summary>
                /// Registers all handlers for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
                /// </summary>
                public void AddAllHandlers()
                {

                }

                /// <summary>
                /// Registers all sagas for this namespace segment and its child namespaces.
                /// </summary>
                /// <remarks>
                /// Includes sagas in this namespace: <see cref="AddPaymentsPolicy"/>.
                /// </remarks>
